Hear what Brad Stevens has to say after his contract extension press conference.
https://t.co/IBDL6e2lGl
Stevens: "Every offseason I sit down with my management team, my family. They're having as much fun as I am here." https://t.co/kd9wjm7dhE
Ainge says the Celtics had 8 players in for workouts this morning, and have worked out between 40-50 players already this summer.
Ainge: "I see (Brad) at work every day. I know my urgency. That's what we live forr, to get back to being championship contenders."
Stevens: "I was a lot more nervous the last time I sat up here (after leaving Butler.) I couldn't be more happy about (extending his deal.)"
Stevens on his extension: "The biggest thing, we want to strive to compete to fill in that blank banner up there." https://t.co/74mEx9hAKG
Stevens: "You wanna work in a place where you feel empowered everyday. It's great to be here. We're looking forward to the challenge ahead."
Ainge on his negotiation: "We had a 10-15 minute negotiation. And then we turned (our attention) to Brad... Who he is is unmatched."
Ainge: "It's been a wonderful work environment. We're building a stronger trust year in and year out. I'm excited about the next chapter."
Pagliuca on Stevens: "We didn't just get him here to get him away from Duke. Brad embodies every true Celtic value from soup to nuts."
Wyc: "It's a great day for the Celtics. Danny and Brad have agreed to long-term extensions to run the team for many years to come."
